author: nativesixs
message: fix(curriculum): update the most obvious answer to less obvious (#58605)

files.patch:
@@ -44,27 +44,27 @@ What are the main components of the freeCodeCamp certification coursework?
 
 ## --answers--
 
-Reading textbooks.
+Reading textbooks and giving tech talks on the subjects learned in the certification.
 
 ### --feedback--
 
-It is the most bite-sized of these options.
+Refer back to the first minute of this video for the answer.
 
 ---
 
-Writing essays.
+Writing essays, contributing to open source projects and doing a freelance project.
 
 ### --feedback--
 
-It is the most bite-sized of these options.
+Refer back to the first minute of this video for the answer.
 
 ---
 
-Attending webinars.
+Attending webinars and doing short coding challenges.
 
 ### --feedback--
 
-It is the most bite-sized of these options.
+Refer back to the first minute of this video for the answer.
 
 ---
